INSERT INTO delivery_addresses ( region_id, customer_id, address_name, address, post_code, main, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{regionId}, #{customerId}, #{addressName}, #{address}, #{postCode}, -1, NOW(), NOW() );
SELECT delivery_address_id AS addressId, region_id AS regionId, customer_id AS customerId, address_name AS addressName, address, post_code AS postCode, main, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM delivery_addresses WHERE region_id = #{regionId} AND customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY delivery_address_id DESC;
